thread.section_title: Luxy Hair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxy Hair | www.luxyhair.com
thread.title: Victoria Perez
thread.title_full: Luxy Hair reviewed by Victoria Perez

author: Victoria Perez
title: Victoria Perez
text: My hair was very damaged from my hairstylist accidentally putting too much developer, which caused my hair to break and become shorter each time I applied heat. So unfortunately I had no choice to cut my long beautiful hair. I lost so much confidence because of that. I was hesitant to try extensions because I didn't want to look like I was wearing a wig or it looked fake or anything but I decided to give Luxy a try and honestly hands down the best decision I ever made. I 200% love my extensions. It looks so natural and even with my short hair, it blends beautifully. I really did believe I was going to have to just wait for my hair to grow but now that I have my luxies, I am able to style my hair like I used to. I'm not one to write reviews for products but Luxy deserves credit for helping me regain my confidence back. Thanks Luxy for helping me feel beautiful again!!!!
